Name: SUNBURST
Components: V,S, M(tire and a piece ofsunstone)
Description: Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60-foot radius centeredon a point you choose within range. Each creature inthat light must make a Constitution saving throw. On afailed save, a creature takes 12d6 radiant damage and isblinded for 1minute. On a successful save, it takes halfas much damage and isn't blinded bythis spell.
